hero-section.title: Enable the most efficient swaps on Algorand with
hero-section.paragraph: Folks Router provides the best prices, lowest fees, and most efficient routes for swapping through DEX aggregation.
why-folks-router.title: Why Folks Router?
why-folks-router.paragraph: Get access to greater liquidity on the main DEXs
folks-router-advantages.title: Advantages of using Folks Router
folks-router-advantages.paragraph: There are several ways in which Folks Router can accelerate the growth of your next project.
folks-router-advantages.card-description: One line of code, and your project gets access to the most efficient swaps on Algorand.
At least 50% of swap fees from your Folks Router integration will be distributed to your project.
Our DEX partners combine for the deepest liquidity possible on the Algorand network.
manage-your-assets.title: Manage your assets with our ecosystem
manage-your-assets.paragraph: Folks Finance provides a wide range of features to help with a better trade of your DeFi assets.
manage-your-assets.card-description-1: Earn on deposits by contributing to our markets.
manage-your-assets.card-description-2: Access instant liquidity for a variety of assets.
manage-your-assets.card-description-3: Join our Governance and earn boosted ALGO rewards.
manage-your-assets.card-description-4: Get smart about crypto and DeFi with Folks Academy.
